overview:
Fabrice Pakin is an entrepreneur based in Nice, France. Fabrice is the founder of Sagevox a coming soon innovative platform and app that help individuals manage their health. Sagevox is the first interactive community dedicated to active and healthy aging.

Fabrice also created in his previous job at GFI an innovation Lab focused in mobile and contactless technologies. The Lab has been selected to deploy the first NFC museum visit in France at the Museum of Modern and contemporary Arts of Nice.

Previously, Fabrice successfully started and sold to Microfolie’s a company named Magellan Multimidia in Brazil. Magellan was a leading publisher of educative cdroms and the exclusive producer of exclusive titles made for the great Art exhibits (Monet, Botero, Dali and Picasso).

In 1988 Fabrice accomplished a world tour as a free-lance reporter. It was a fantastic and unique experience awarded by the Trophy ADIA/IEA.

Fabrice is married with 3 boys and loves rowing, cycling and swimming. He is proud to have reached at 43 years old the final of the world coastal rowing championship.
